Package Controller

Class ClientThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Controller.ClientThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientThread extends Thread
Thread communicating Client with Server. View requests this thread to send moves to Server, and it updates the view according to Server's response.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientThread

      public ClientThread(int port, ClientView view)
      Parameters:
      port - port on which the server listens
      view - ClientView which must be connected with this thread's logic

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Opens socket and tries to connect with server. Listens to server messages and performs adequate actions. Requests view updates if needed.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • getBoard

      private Board getBoard(String gameVariant, String message)
      Reconstructs game board basing on server message
      Parameters:
      gameVariant - type of checkers game
      message - String of fields separated with commas. Each character represents one field: w - white pawn b - black pawn W - white queen B - black queen 0 - empty field
      Returns:
      Board reconstructed from server's message

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Sends request to perform a move to the server.
      Parameters:
      x1 - starting field x coordinate
      y1 - starting field y coordinate
      x2 - landing field x coordinate
      y2 - landing field y coordinate

    • closeSocket

      public void closeSocket()
      Safely closes the socket.
